title: The Tower Of The Dark Light
description: Invitation to a Nightmare...Lisanne had heard rumors of a terrible curse on the Devillier family--but when they summoned her to dance at their forbidding seaside mansion, even she was ill-prepared for the macabre ritual she was called on to perform.Suddenly reality turned into a swirling, evil dream--as spectres from the unspeakable past rose to drive her mind to the brink of madness. Who were the sinister, otherworldly Devilliers? Was she still Lisanne Ellender, ballerina--or a fatal Avenging Angel in the grotesque dance of death?
author: Elizabeth Erin Mande
